snippet.title: Urban Strife Prologue Demo is live @ Steam Next Fest
snippet.description:
We're proud to announce our upcoming TBS Survival RPG will be part of the Steam Next Fest 2021 with a playable Prologue Demo. You'll be able to test your mettle against both undead and human opponents of varying difficulty while trying to help Urban Shelter break free from the grip of a cruel warlord. You can download our demo starting Oct 1, 10:00 AM PDT (20:00 GMT) from our store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/710230/Urban_Strife/
